thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com | 18 of 241
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text: The shipping time was ok. The trees 3 to 4 feet were barely 3 feet. I was one tree short but when I contacted them they asked if I wanted them to ship the tree or refund. I requested a refund and they did refund for the missing tree. Overall I was well satisfied with them and have recommended them to others for trees. I will also buy from them again but will assume that if I want a 4 foot tree I need to order 4 to 5 foot trees not 3 to 4. They are a very honest business and even though I had a problem they quickly took care of it.
